Description
Application
This is the skeleton of the library project
BadEntityException
 
BadTargetEntityTypeException
 
Book
This is an implementation of the Entity interface describing a book
BookAvailability
This enum is used to show the availability status of a book.
Books
This class is used to run the corresponding codes when the library is performing book-related actions
Entity
All the library elements are subclasses of this interface
EntityNotFoundException
 
Exit
This class is used to run the corresponding codes when the User wants to terminate the library.
Gender
This enum is used to show gender of a person MALE and FEMALE objects represent the gender of a person.
InvalidInputException
 
InvalidRequestedActionException
 
Library
This interface describes the common behaviors of libraries.
LibraryImp
This is an implementation of the Library interface using the singleton and the state design patterns.
LibState
This interface is used to create the states of the library UI which are going to be used when implementing the state design pattern
Main
This class is used to run the corresponding codes when the library is to show the user the main menu
Member
This class defines a subclass of Person abstract class describing a library member
Members
This class is used to run the corresponding codes when the library is performing member-related actions
Person
This class is going to be the parent class for library entities that are humans
